description:
The restaurant industry was already one of the most complex businesses in the world before the Fourth Industrial Revolution arrived, introducing new consumer demands for innovation and convenience, new technologies for managing operations and connecting with guests, and a fast pace of disruption that has helped upstart companies and segments leapfrog established organizations. Now risks are coming out of nowhere, threatening to blindside even the savviest leaders.

Recognizing that a change in one aspect of the operation ripples across all the others, we apply a holistic and integrated approach that breaks down any barriers between business functions and dispels any bias that may color decision making. We combine data-driven insights with intuition earned over decades in the industry, enabling our clients to confidently push ahead in our rapidly evolving industry.

Here are some highlights of our restaurant industry insights.
